rules_text:
At the beginning of each end step, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature and target player gains X life, where X is the number of tokens you created this turn.
When creatures you both own and control named Eunie, Ouroboros Medic and Taion, Ouroboros Tactician attack, you may exile them, then meld them into Eunie’s Ouroboros. It enters tapped and attacking.
